Name: The Slopes
About the game: Ready for your best day on the mountain? You’ll get it when you hit The Slopes. Experience skiing like never before! No clunky boots, no chairlift lines and no harsh cold! Just you and the mountain--and any number of obstacles. Trees, fences, logs, rocks and poles might slow you down and ruin your chances on the leaderboard but at least you won’t need ski patrol! Tilt your head to steer and use your ski poles for speed. And remember, just because you won’t get a concussion doesn’t mean the bumps don’t hurt! Built from the ground up for VR, The Slopes is compatible with both the HTC Vive and Oculus Rift + Touch with support for standing AND roomscale spaces.
